attributes.action: Instate December 4th as National Trans Day Of Napping.
attributes.additional_details: The idea was originally created on the blog officialsjw.tumblr.com (officialsjw.tumblr.com/post/132349068317/transgender-day-of-napping-december-4th)
attributes.background: Trans day of napping is a day in which transgender individuals can take a day to rest, relax and recuperate. Trans people experience prejudice, oppression and erasure on a daily basis and this is a chance for a day to be set aside on which they can stay in a safe place of their choice  to recover.
